settings.product_description_text: Compression socks originally designed by a family of doctors. Boost circulation, prevent swelling & DVT, and support all-day energy with fun designs.
settings.preorder_text: Pre-order now to secure your preferred design. Your entire order will ship once this item becomes available. Thanks for your patience!
settings.loved: Trusted by Runners, Lifters, Hikers and everyday active Aussies

settings.replo_text_6674155f-fb47-4b78-b25f-ce82c: Transform your space with our versatile collection of everyday essentials. Elevate your routine with essentials designed for comfort and simplicity.
settings.replo_text_27865000-50d4-4edd-bc32-c98a3: 15–20 mmHg of targeted compression improves blood flow and oxygen delivery, keeping your legs feeling fresh for longer. Push harder during your session and bounce back faster afterwards.
settings.replo_text_bd0f26c7-4806-47b3-a4fb-5e452: Shaped to follow the natural contours of your feet for a snug, supportive fit. No slipping, no bunching, just a locked-in feel that moves with you every step of the way.
settings.replo_text_a648e811-66ac-4a9c-8d54-13bfc: Targeted arch compression gives your feet a stable base for every stride, lift or climb. More control, less fatigue, and support that adapts as you move.
settings.replo_text_9ff31723-557b-4c53-a3aa-8cc2e: Extra padding at the toe and heel protects high-friction zones, keeping your feet comfortable and blister-free through long runs, rides or training sessions.
settings.replo_text_ecdf373a-710f-4079-9fff-4b4f0: Transform your space with our versatile collection of everyday essentials. Elevate your routine with essentials designed for comfort and simplicity.
settings.replo_text_771c31d1-b7b5-454b-95ee-2485d: 15–20 mmHg of targeted compression improves blood flow and oxygen delivery, keeping your legs feeling fresh for longer. Push harder during your session and bounce back faster afterwards.
settings.replo_text_6c401324-1e21-465d-8121-bc170: Shaped to follow the natural contours of your feet for a snug, supportive fit. No slipping, no bunching, just a locked-in feel that moves with you every step of the way.
settings.replo_text_e74ec7a5-bae5-4183-9a9a-c1fb7: Targeted arch compression gives your feet a stable base for every stride, lift or climb. More control, less fatigue, and support that adapts as you move.
settings.replo_text_78ded13b-0e21-4908-982b-98db8: Extra padding at the toe and heel protects high-friction zones, keeping your feet comfortable and blister-free through long runs, rides or training sessions.

settings.title: Grad. Compression
settings.description: 15–20 mmHg of targeted compression improves blood flow and oxygen delivery, keeping your legs feeling fresh for longer. Push harder during your session and bounce back faster afterwards.

settings.title: Anatomical Fit
settings.description: Shaped to follow the natural contours of your feet for a snug, supportive fit. No slipping, no bunching, just a locked-in feel that moves with you every step of the way.

settings.title: Arch Support
settings.description: Targeted arch compression gives your feet a stable base for every stride, lift or climb. More control, less fatigue, and support that adapts as you move.

settings.badge_text: Designed by Doctors in partnership with Athletes
settings.main_title: Why active Aussies trust Dr. Woof
